title: Rank decay
body:
So I'm currently gold 2 in flex. This season is there decay in gold? Kinda cbf playing flex anymore.

Cheers in advance.

replies.body:
As far as I'm aware, Riot hasn't changed how decay works since it was restricted to Platinum and above. You would definitely think Riot would announce such a change, and I can't remember seeing anything of the like.

EDIT: The information in Riot's [ranked FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h3) supports that there is no decay in Gold, so you're fine (unless someone has failed to update the info, which is unlikely).
What HeartVine said :) Enjoy your skin!

Not too worried about the skin. I've just been consistently gold for the past few seasons. I have no desire to get any higher. Too lazy tbh. Dont play the game enough for myself to improve either i guess. 

On another note. I was talking with a friend last night. We both agreed, gold really should have decay. Due to it being the top tier rewards (skin). I wouldn't mind playing games at all to stay in gold tbh. 

What are other peoples thoughts on this? From memory I believe it had decay back in season 3?

I'm kind of in the same boat. I want the skin but that's about as far as my ambition goes. I have to agree about decay in Gold though. It doesn't make much sense that in a tier where you get the 'premium' rewards you don't have to maintain it.
People in Gold should decay tbh. So many people buy boosts for the skin and never touch ranked again.
